page.title: 04SPORTS
page.content: In Port Glasgow there is a wide variety of indoor and outdoor {activities.} The outdoor activities include the Parklea playing fields where one is able to participate in a game of soccer.Also there are fishing waters belonging to the Port Glasgow Angling {Club}who have competitions every so often for club members.In the Devol area there is a golf course for private use. The indoor activities include the Boglestone Community Centre's squash, sauna, badminton, and indoor bowls facilities.These are widely used.Also in Port Glasgow there is an indoor swimming pool which also has club nights. Briefly the{recreation} facilities in Port Glasgow are acceptable to the people of the town.
